name: Air Rush (CipherSharpDev)
description:
Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam 99                                                                                                                

Theme: Birds                                                                                                                                         

Limitation: Can't stop moving

You're a bird during a volcanic explosion and you must fly away. A massive wave of volcanic material is rushing towards you. You must dodge the spherical volcano material to avoid being slowed down. Don't stay still though, rocks are flying from behind you, and you must keep moving/flying to avoid them.

The game is endless, and the longer you last without getting engulfed in the volcanic material, the higher your high-score. (maybe after the game jam I will add a leaderboard) 

Game Control:                                                                                                                                                  

Move up: W or Up Arrow                                                                                                                                       

Move Down: S or Down Arrow

Hope you enjoy the game!
